name: Gild Tesoro
text: On Play DON!!-1 if your leader has the [FILM] type, add 2 cost 4 or lower [FILM] type characters from your trash to your hand.

effect.text: if your leader has the [FILM] type, add 2 cost 4 or lower [FILM] type characters from your trash to your hand.
